behavior: #0Talk-1st time
#0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Speak thee the name of God.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Thine own god, if thou canst recall.

behavior: #0Choose "I do not know" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: As I thought. Such memories were lost by thy kind, long ago.

behavior: #0Choose "I do not know" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: And so it is ye...who yearn for darkness.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "I do not know" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Give thy memory a nudge.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "I do not know" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: And name thee thy God.

behavior: #0Choose "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Ahh, then thou'st not forgotten.

behavior: #0Choose "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Perhaps 'tis why we may converse.

behavior: #0Choose "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text:
I am known as Shira,
servant to the Princess Filianore, matriarch of the church.

behavior: #0Choose "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text:
They who are ken to God's name
are surely ken to the terrors of the dark.

behavior: #0Choose "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Please, I bid thee take not from the Princess her peace or rest.

behavior: #0Choose "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: As the fire waneth, does she lie by the dark, all for the sake of Man.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Thou'st a kind heart.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: To speak to a captive such as I.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: It is no surprise thou rememb'rest our God.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: May I ask thee a kindness?

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text:
Perhaps thou'st beheld the lone dragon
that inhabiteth this city?

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Midir is his name, and the Archdragons are his forebears.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text:
He once railed against the dark, but was by dark afflicted.
Now here, returned, he remaineth.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: To watch over the sleeping Princess, true to the old accord.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: ...And yet, I would have thee put the dragon to rest.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after choosing "Gwyn" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Afore the dark consumeth him, and his vows are forgot.

behavior: #0Choose "Refuse" to the 3rd query, or "No, it's nothing" to the 4th
subdialogue_text: Very well. Then hasten on thy journey.

behavior: #0Choose "Refuse" to the 3rd query, or "No, it's nothing" to the 4th
subdialogue_text: Only, disturb not the sleeping Princess.

behavior: #0Choose "Refuse" to the 3rd query, or "No, it's nothing" to the 4th
subdialogue_text: As the fire waneth, does she lie by the dark, all for the sake of Man.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Refuse" to the 3rd query, or "No, it's nothing" to the 4th
subdialogue_text: Carest thou to speak thy peace?

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Refuse" to the 3rd query, or "No, it's nothing" to the 4th
subdialogue_text: Hast thou mine entreaty reconsidered?

behavior: #0Choose "Accept the request" to either the 3rd or 4th query
subdialogue_text: I offer my sincerest gratitude, thou who art ken to God's name.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept the request" to either the 3rd or 4th query
subdialogue_text: Please, take this.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept the request" to either the 3rd or 4th query
subdialogue_text:
I have asked a thing most terrible of thee.
May this token of thanks be of aid.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Accept the request" to either the 3rd or 4th query
subdialogue_text: I beg of thee, put the great dragon to rest.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Accept the request" to either the 3rd or 4th query
subdialogue_text: Afore the dark consumeth him, and his vows are forgot.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: So, Midir hath into the chasm fallen.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: Still, his voice I hear. The dark grieveth him yet.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: I prithee, put him to rest.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: Afore the dark consumeth him, and his vows are forgot.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text:
Just afore the church of the Princess standeth a tower,
honouring ancient knights.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text:
There lieth a small shrine,
behind the sculpted knight which beareth no arms.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: Tis from there one may descend the chasm of darkness.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: I prithee, put the great dragon to rest.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: I know, I have asked of thee a thing most terrible.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: Forgive me, thou wert but mine only hope.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text:
Just afore the church of the Princess standeth a tower
built to honour ancient knights.
Behind the sculpted knight which beareth no arms,

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text:
is a small shrine,
from which one may descend the chasm of darkness.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: I prithee, put the great dragon to rest.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after initially defeating Darkeater Midir on the bridge
subdialogue_text: Afore the dark consumeth him, and his vows are forgot.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Darkeater Midir
subdialogue_text: My most humble thanks.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Darkeater Midir
subdialogue_text: Tis thanks to thee the dragon erred not from his vows.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Darkeater Midir
subdialogue_text:
Please, take this.
A final gift of thanks.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Darkeater Midir
subdialogue_text:
Now, hasten on thy journey,
but wake not the slumbering Princess.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating Darkeater Midir
subdialogue_text: As the fire waneth, does she lie by the dark, all for the sake of Man.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating Darkeater Midir
subdialogue_text: My humblest thanks.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating Darkeater Midir
subdialogue_text:
Now, hasten on thy journey,
but wake not the slumbering Princess.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating Darkeater Midir
subdialogue_text: As the fire waneth, does she lie by the dark, all for the sake of Man.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after reaching rank 1 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: Oh! Thou'rt now a spear of the church!

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after reaching rank 1 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: What a wonderful, blessed day this is.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after reaching rank 1 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text:
With a spear such as thee,
surely the Princess will slumber most gently,
and Midir's vows will be honoured.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after reaching rank 1 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text:
I must thank thee,
as a servant of the Princess, and a dear friend to Midir.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after reaching rank 1 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: May thy travels be resplendent with glory.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after reaching rank 1 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text:
As the fire waneth, does she lie by the dark,
but now with thee to shelter her sleep.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after reaching rank 1 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text:
Bless ye spears of the church.
May thy travels be resplendent with glory.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after reaching rank 2 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: Ah, thou'st... A Divine Spear become!

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after reaching rank 2 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text:
An honour once bestowed in the time of the Gods,
nearly unheard of in this age of waning fire.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after reaching rank 2 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: As a servant of the Princess, and friend to Midir...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after reaching rank 2 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: I am honoured to have met thee.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after reaching rank 2 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text:
As the fire waneth, does she lie by the dark,
but now with thee to shelter her sleep.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after reaching rank 2 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text:
Bless ye divine spears.
May thy travels be resplendent with glory.

behavior: #0Upon appearing in the ruins, after the protagonist touches the embraced shell
subdialogue_text: I've searched for thee, dark-stricken creature.

behavior: #0Upon appearing in the ruins, after the protagonist touches the embraced shell
subdialogue_text:
I am Shira, daughter of the Duke, descendant of gods,
and trusted friend to Midir.

behavior: #0Upon appearing in the ruins, after the protagonist touches the embraced shell
subdialogue_text:
At once, I am the honour of the gods,
the glory of fire, and the fear of the dark.

behavior: #0Upon appearing in the ruins, after the protagonist touches the embraced shell
subdialogue_text: Thou shalt not go unpunished.

behavior: #0Upon appearing in the ruins, after the protagonist touches the embraced shell
subdialogue_text: For thy treachery, thy profanity, and thy shameless yearning!

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Remember this, creature.

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Ne'er will I forgive thy kind.

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist, after reaching rank 1 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: Try again, to remember.

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist, after reaching rank 1 as a Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: The great honour it was to be a spear.

behavior: #0Upon dying
#0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: Never would I ever...

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: ...forgive thy lowly kind...

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: ##Ahh, but why...

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: ##Art thou to bed with the dark?
